org.jppf.utils.streams

Class StreamUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jppf.utils.streams.StreamUtils

  • public final class StreamUtils
extends Object
    Collection of utility methods for manipulating streams.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void close(Closeable closeable)
      Attempt to close the specified closeable without logging an eventual error.

      Attempt to close the specified closeable and log any eventual error.

      Attempt to silently close (no exception logging) the specified closeable.

      Copy the data read from the specified input stream to the specified output stream.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public static void close(Closeable closeable)
                  throws IOException
        Attempt to close the specified closeable without logging an eventual error.
        Parameters:
        closeable - the closeable to close.
        Throws:
        IOException - if any error occurs while closing the closeable.

      • closeSilent

        public static void closeSilent(Closeable closeable)
        Attempt to silently close (no exception logging) the specified closeable.
        Parameters:
        closeable - the closeable to close.

      • close

        public static void close(Closeable closeable,
         org.slf4j.Logger log)
        Attempt to close the specified closeable and log any eventual error.
        Parameters:
        closeable - the closeable to close.
        log - the logger to use; if null no logging occurs.

      • getInputStreamAsByte

        public static byte[] getInputStreamAsByte(InputStream is)
                                   throws IOException
        Get the content of an input stream as an array of bytes. This method closes the input stream before terminating.
        Parameters:
        is - the input stream to read from.
        Returns:
        a byte array.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO error occurs.

      • copyStream

        public static void copyStream(InputStream is,
              OutputStream os)
                       throws IOException
        Copy the data read from the specified input stream to the specified output stream. This method closes both streams before terminating.
        Parameters:
        is - the input stream to read from.
        os - the output stream to write to.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • copyStream

        public static void copyStream(InputStream is,
              OutputStream os,
              boolean closeStreams)
                       throws IOException
        Copy the data read from the specified input stream to the specified output stream. This method closes both streams before terminating.
        Parameters:
        is - the input stream to read from.
        os - the output stream to write to.
        closeStreams - true to cause the streams to be closed at the end of the copy, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • waitKeyPressed

        public static void waitKeyPressed()
                           throws Exception
        Display a message and wait until a key is pressed.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any I/O error occurs.

      • waitKeyPressed

        public static void waitKeyPressed(String message)
                           throws Exception
        Display a message and wait until a key is pressed.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to dispplay
        Throws:
        Exception - if any I/O error occurs.
